definitions.definition: An eating utensil shaped like a spoon , the bowl of which is divided into tines like those of a fork , and so has the function of both implements ; some sporks have a serrated edge so they can also function as a knife .

main_definition: An eating utensil shaped like a spoon , the bowl of which is divided into tines like those of a fork , and so has the function of both implements ; some sporks have a serrated edge so they can also function as a knife .
